data.title: Setting up windows backup for Windows Server 2012 standard using powershell
data.meta_description:
I have never used PowerShell before and I am trying to set up a backup schedule in out 2012 server. Here is the line I have used to create it, 
wbdmin enable backup -addtarget:\\ghdc01\SrvrBackups\GHDC01\WindowsBackups -…
data.text:
I do have the module installed according to the module list you had me bring up

Modules.txt

Using this info, will I be ale to set up schedules backups to run daily on the server?
